name: deimosrising
text: Bonus points for use of word "Negress", abbreviation of "please" as "pls" rather than "plz". Some white supremicists are highly literate, this is why they are so dangerous.

name: philosophe
text: He even used a period to denote abbv.! How nice!

name: nsrdude
text: A comment left by nsrdude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by enough_talk, divot, riotdejaneiro, TonyHighwind, chivalress, luckypyjamas, woof, Magb, Zem, FinnS, yaegmenthor, holly_golightly, Shinkicka)

name: equinn2006
text: No. Pat is a dick.

name: waldo913
text:
I know this comment is over a year old, nsrdude, and you will probably never check it again, but I want you to know that it is okay to like a comic character, even if he is generally considered to be a dick.

It is... okay.

name: leftsaidtim
text: ...but is it rad?

name: bordello
text: Yes.

name: shmuckeles
text:
oh god i love that :(
like he is so sad to see a negress picture poor dude really that hit him hard

name: korukyu
text: Poor guy just was unexpectedly startled by those rude titties.

name: mr_pete
text: Beef is more embarrassed by phpBB exploits than Pat's shame.

name: ghostd
text: Is there any group on the internet more fun to make fun of than white supremacists? They just get so angry that you've insulted their virtual white pride, it's hilarious.

name: boredom_man
text: I'd say physics kooks, but they don't really "group" very effectively.

name: ssddr
text: White supremacists dont know how to properly use capitilization.

name: wulvaine
text: This comment would have been funnier had you spelled 'capitalization' correctly. Sorry, I'm an English snob sometimes. I don't do it to be a dick; I just do it because my brain is hardwired this way.

name: pogo
text: Me, too.  But we should go easy, as some of these youngsters probably type with their junk.

name: thesoulbear
text:
Man, every time you talk this way it's like I'm just standing on top of a big gas tank that says "Capitalization".

wulvaine...would want it...this way...

name: pohlhoud
text: Hopefully, Georgia_Wizard didn't see the So Nude gallery.

name: joeyramoney
text: Trespassers to America will kneel in shame before god.

name: invidious
text: Considering the original trespassers were the white man, I'd say we have a hilariously entertaining afterlife coming up.

name: dougthehead
text: A comment left by dougthehead was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by HonestTom, Windex, slalvation)

name: honesttom
text: Wasn't that just Vlad hacking the site?

name: dougthehead
text: I always thought it was funnier if the comic implies that there are white supremacists trolling the internet, looking for websites where their views are accepted, then setting up a community on the website gypsy-style.  Vlad going to all that trouble to create the message board's tone isn't as funny as it being an unintended consequence of his redesign to the website's main page, in my opinion.

name: philosophe
text: That is funnier. I never thought of it that way. Wow.

name: zem
text: shots of philippe before and after dougthehead's post

name: spinynorman
text: I assume Vlad had linked the forums on several high-traffic racist message boards.

name: tekende
text: I completely agree and took it that way initially, only realizing it after you pointed it out.

name: ezcmac
text: Seeing Pat with such concern strewn across his face gives me such a spate of depression that I can't stand looking at it.

name: apocowarg
text: No one seems to have asked the most important question. Why is there a nude gallery on a Subway sandwich shop message board?

name: atmus
text: Well, Playboy did a spread on the "Girls of Subway" awhile ago.

name: slalvation
text: Because Vlad hacked it and put a nude gallery on.

name: apocowarg
text: OH! It all makes sense now. That's where the Big Ole Titties link brought you.

name: straw
text: Also keep in mind that later, Vlad will have a webcam featuring his sandwich girls eating the sandwiches.  All of this must be kept in mind.

name: invidious
text: The continuity in Achewood kicks all ass in room.

name: j03y
text: the fact they have a nude gallery at all is funny on its own.

name: ctrl_z
text: Why is Beef using a computer to go online?!

name: yingkaixing
text:
The bullet in his spine doesn't provide a very fast connection. It's only about 9600 baud.

And that's terrible.

name: yingkaixing
text: Or maybe because he's OCD. Either way, I get the feeling his personal connection is more of an emergency thing in case he's, say, trapped in a three-acre pit full of men fighting each other.

name: charchar
text: Also, Beef doesn't have a keyboard.  That's like going skydiving and not having gravity.

name: tekende
text: He typed out that e-mail to his mom pretty handily without a keyboard though.

name: tellumo
text: It kinda just helps him focus his chi .

name: kovatch
text: Dixe Dan LOL

name: dipstikk
text: Haha, how the hell did Dixie_Dan become a mod?

name: raticus
text: Vlad is a savvy businessman - he knows how to delegate.

name: milo
text: "flaming cross animated GIF"
